text: The application is used to calculate multi-criteria evaluations of various decision options. In the 'Calculations' tab, there is an area where MCDA methods can be combined using a graphical representation to calculate the results.
At the moment, it works to connect blocks, check the types of blocks we want to connect, remove connections between blocks, calculate results, search for methods by name in the searchbar.
The application is under development and therefore errors may occur in its functioning.

Work is currently underway on the ability to upload files and perform calculations on the data they contain, adding parameters such as normalization methods, distance measures or defuzzification methods.
The appearance of the site will also be changed, but the priority is to get the core functionality working.
